column1: Little Goat Diner////The interior is very classy
column2: while playing on the diner theme. It is a little obvious that the whole shebang is funded by the BRG Group. The waitstaff is friendly
column3: as friendly as you can be when you have hundreds of people shuffling in on a weekend afternoon to flash their wide eyes and exclamations of "Oh my god this is so good
column4: I need to take a picture."
